attributes.action: reduce the holidays of Members of Parliament to 20 days per annum plus bank holidays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of Parliament currently enjoy a 76 day summer recess, with additional fortnightly recesses enjoyed at Christmas and Easter.  This is in addition to 'half-term' holidays and their own annual leave provision.

This petition seeks to bring the leave entitlement of MPs into line with that of their constituents, and to give MPs more time to work within Parliament and within their Constituency.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
